Key: Man, it sure is late.

I was just so focused on my errands, I lost track of
time. I'm getting hungry so I should hurry home.

(Oh... There aren't many people around, so it feels
kind of lonely. Oh, well. This is the shortcut, so
I'll keep going.)

Hm... Who are they? They seem to be wearing the
same uniform as mine. But they don't seem to be
going home. What are they doing here?

I don't recognize them, but... It's dangerous to be
out so late. I'll tell them to hurry home.

Hey, you guys. This area's pretty dangerous when it
gets dark. You should hurry home.
Hehe... Hey, you. Who do you think you're talking to?

Sigh. Seems about right. He must think we are two
simple girls.

(Seems like I made the wrong move, approaching them.
They're really cute, like models or idols. But they're
kind of weird.)

(But I mean, I started the conversation for a reason.
I can't just leave these cute girls wandering out and
about like this without saying something, right?)

You guys are students at Raizen High, right? It's
dangerous for you to be out this late. I'll escort you
guys to somewhere better lit.
Hehe... I hear you. Can't you tell there is no need?

Well, at least let me see you guys off. I feel bad
just leaving.

Understood. You're worried about us. It's kind that
you'd go to the trouble for us. However...

There's no need for that. We're the dangerous ones out
here.

We are a family of the night. This darkness is our
heaven. The silence is our territory. ...You are just
some sad prey that wandered across our path.
Um... Excuse me?

Oh, are you doing some kind of role-play activity?
It's still dangerous, so just call it quits for today.
Chuckle. Kaguya. He totally doesn't get it.

Sh-Shut up. We're not playing pretend, nor is it a
play. Yuzuru, stop laughing and help!

Understood. Very well. Listen, you human. We are not
weak women. We are evil, human-eating monsters.
And you shall be our prey.
...Wh-What?!

It's not that different from what I said earlier! Why's
mine no good, but Yuzuru's got you all surprised?!

W-Well. It was different because of how serious she
was. Yours sounded like a gag.
I-I was serious. I was thinking of it seriously...

Reassurance. There, there. Kaguya, the things that
others pity about you are also what make you
adorable.

Um... You're kidding, right? You guys don't look evil.
Adorable monsters like you two?

Agreed. Very well. Then let us show you proof.
Kaguya.
Huh, me?

Affirmative. That's right. Kaguya, this is your chance
to redeem yourself.
Hmph. I guess if you put it that way. Hey, human...!
Human...? I have a name. It's Shido Itsuka.

Very well. Then, Shido. I will show you the beauty of
the descendants of the night.
The beauty of what?

Once you've met our eyes, your heart will be stolen
and you will become our slave. Eat this...!
...Ahaaaan... Ufuuuun.
Pity... That was pretty bad.
W-Well then, I'm going to go home.

H-Hey, wait. What do you mean? What's going on?
Hey, Yuzuruuuuuu?!

Sigh. Right back at you. That wasn't beauty at all.
Ahaaan"? Seriously? Don't be a fool."

Sh-Shut up! I'm not on my A-game today! Shido, don't
go home!

No, I've had enough. Sorry for bothering you guys.
See you...
Wait. One more time! Let me try one more time.

Advice. Kaguya, if you can't do it, I suggest you not
offer it. Besides, I'm hungry.
(*sigh* What should I do? I can't deal with them forever.)
Urge them to stop messing around and go home.
Hang out with them just a little longer.

Hey guys. It's late. Why don't you continue your
role-playing tomorrow? I want to go home now.
Waahhh. So messed up. Yuzuru, he won't accept it.

Laugh. What part of you can he accept, though? It's
because you're not taking it seriously. Sorry that you
had to witness this.

No, it's fine. If your house is nearby, I can walk you
guys.

Refusal. There is no need for that. Kaguya, let's stop
playing and show him our true powers.
*Grunt*... Very well. I'll show you our true powers.
Huh? True powers...?

Clarity. Shido, let me show you. Our true nature and
the power of the darkness.
Watch carefully!

Fine, fine. Just one more time, okay? Once you're
done, be sure to go home. Got it?
YAY!
...Hey, wait! You can only talk like that for so long!

Reassurance. There, there, Kaguya. Well, I guess we
might as well show him our powers while we're here.
Huh...? What are they talking about?

Analysis. What we've been talking about isn't a joke.
Everything is truth, based on reality.

Addendum. Although... Kaguya does not yet possess the
power of attraction.

Hehe. Little did you know you were lured into this
place. You'd best curse your own bad luck. I'm going
to make you regret laughing at me.
Snigger. You asked for it, Kaguya. Anyways, let's go.
Just watch us!
What?! They transformed...?!
Affirmative. What do you say? Aren't you surprised?
I'm not going to forgive you, even if you cry and beg.
Y-You really were monsters.

Correction. If you're going to call us something, call us
succubi.
Succubi...?

That's right. We are of the clan of the night, feeding
off of humans like yourself.
You eat humans? Then, you're going to eat me too...?
Yes indeed. Did you think we were kidding?
W-Whoa! Don't eat me! I don't want to be eaten alive.
You don't know anything...
Huh? ...Wh-What do you mean?

Explanation. We don't steal the human's flesh. We take
their life as a whole. We eat their spirit.
We succubi only want a fresh male sacrifice.
A fresh male spirit...? What do you mean by that?

W-Well. If I were to steal it fresh from a male, it's one
thing, right?
I still don't get it...
Well, um... That is that.
Well, what is it? Don't hide it, tell me.
Y-Yuzuru! Shido is bullying me!

*Sigh*... If you're embarrassed, then don't tell him.
A succubus essentially gives provocative dreams to
men and then steals their lives.

Summary. Even if you're dumb, you'd know what
I mean, right?

S-So basically, you're some kind of erotic monster?!
More than that... You're embarrassed about explaining
it?

Shut up, shut up. You watch. I'm going to make you
cry like a sweet little baby.
Y-You sure are weird. You don't get it, do you?

Addendum. Kaguya was the one that cried like a sweet
little baby.

Shut up! Just start it already! Yuzuru, you said you
were hungry!

Agreed. Sorry Shido, but I'm going to have to quiet
you down.

(Wh-What the...?! The moment they surrounded me,
I started to feel weak.)

Hahaaa. This is the power of the succubus. It's called
an energy drain. I bet you anything you feel weak
right now.
Y-You're right. I don't have any strength at all...!
Accepted. Now, Yuzuru will take this.
Hey, no fair! Th-Then I'll... take energy from here.
H-Hey. Don't put your hand in there.

(I felt weak as each succubus' hands traveled
around my body. Their fingertips grazed my skin,
and my will to fight was slipping away.)

(This really isn't going to end well. All I did was
approach them with good intentions. I was only worried
about their safety.)

Hehehe... You were bratty, but your spirit tastes
pretty good.

Heavenly. I feel like I'm going to melt. Hehe. Shido,
don't worry. I won't take your life.

You can sleep until your life ends in the dream we
will show you.
H-Help me!

(Eventually, my fatigued body experienced the
illusions of the body-melting phantoms. I guess I
won't be waking up for a while.)
